quotesText.quote: “A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies . . . The man who never reads lives only one.”
quotesText.author: George R.R. Martin

quotesText.quote: “Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing.”
quotesText.author: Harper Lee

quotesText.quote: “There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate’s loot on Treasure Island.”
quotesText.author: Walt Disney

quotesText.quote: “My alma mater was books, a good library…. I could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity.”
quotesText.author: Malcolm X

quotesText.quote: “There is no Frigate like a Book To take us Lands away.”
quotesText.author: Emily Dickinson
